Title: Poole Bay Beach Management Scheme - Groyne Building Programme 2022-2024
Description:
The Poole Bay Beach Management Scheme is a 17-year programme to deliver the renewal of coastal defences and to secure coastal protection in Poole Bay for the next 100 years.

Title: Large Scale Light Installations
Description:
Southend LuminoCity is a light festival that initially took place over three nights during February 2022 to celebrate Southend's newly awarded City Status.
